item.title: Ultimate Coaster Spreadsheet
item.description: View the project on GitHub here. ðŸŽ¢ Ultimate Coaster Spreadsheet A spreadsheet for tracking your ridden rollercoasters and relevant statistics using the help of FabiÃ¡n RodrÃ­guez's RCDB API. Usage Link to heading Open the spreadsheet and go to File > Make A Copy. Begin inserting your ridden rollercoasters and their respective parks or insert their RCDB IDs. These can be found by going to RCDB, searching for the coaster, and copying the number in the URL.
